a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Direct primary energy consumption from fossil fuels,
Direct primary energy does not account for inefficiencies in fossil fuel production.
Data source: Our World in Data based on BP Statistical Review of World Energy (2022)
Note: Renewables includes hydropower, solar, wind, geothermal, wave, tidal and bioenergy. It does not include traditional biofuels.
